data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study of the genus Macromotettix Günther (Orthoptera: Tetrigoidea: Metrodoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deng, Weian, Zheng, Zhemin, Wei, Shizhen (2007): A taxonomic study of the genus Macromotettix Günther (Orthoptera: Tetrigoidea: Metrodoridae). Zootaxa 1620: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179169
